item.title: Quentin Tarantino Explains Why David Fincher Is Directing the ‘Once Upon a Time in Hollywood’ Netflix Follow-Up
item.description: “The idea that David Fincher actually wants to adapt my work, to me, shows a level of seriousness towards my work that I think needs to be taken into account,” the director said.

item.title: Quentin Tarantino Explains Why David Fincher Is Directing the ‘Once Upon a Time in Hollywood’ Netflix Follow-Up
item.description: “The idea that David Fincher actually wants to adapt my work, to me, shows a level of seriousness towards my work that I think needs to be taken into account,” the director said.

item.title: Quentin Tarantino Scrapped ‘The Movie Critic’ Because It ‘Was Too Much Like’ ‘Once Upon a Time in Hollywood’ and ‘Who Wants to See a Movie About a F—ing Movie Critic?’

item.title: Burbank Int’l Film Fest: Quentin Tarantino Set for Vanguard Award, Career-Retrospective Conversation, on ‘Quentin Tarantino Day’
item.description: The Oscar-winning auteur will be toasted by the mayor of Burbank, in which he has shot portions of his films, and the mayor of El Segundo, where he spent part of his childhood, on Sept. 28.
